name: RemoveDisputeEvidence
description:
Remove specified evidence from a dispute.

Use this tool to remove evidence linked to a specific dispute. The evidence removed will not be sent to the bank by Square. Call this when evidence needs to be withdrawn or updated in a dispute case.

parameters.name: dispute_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the dispute from which evidence should be removed.

value_schema.description: The ID of the dispute from which you want to remove evidence.

parameters.name: evidence_id_to_remove
parameters.description: The unique ID of the evidence to remove from the dispute. Ensure it is accurate to successfully remove the evidence.

value_schema.description: The ID of the evidence you want to remove.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: dispute_id
parameters.description: The ID of the dispute from which you want to remove evidence.

value_schema.description: The ID of the dispute from which you want to remove evidence.

parameters.name: evidence_id
parameters.description: The ID of the evidence you want to remove.

value_schema.description: The ID of the evidence you want to remove.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
